languages.text: {n}Минута тянется за минутой — и в тягостной тишине отстраненность Кибеллы становится все более жуткой. Наконец, девушка пригубливает напиток из бокала и куртуазным голосом изрекает:{/n} "Кажется, вечер превращается в ночь... Прошу, покажи мне вид на улей. Я хочу окинуть взглядом твои владения".

{n}Several long minutes pass. In the suffocating silence, Kibellah's aloofness becomes all the more disturbing. Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."
languages.original_text: {n}Минута тянется за минутой — и в тягостной тишине отстраненность Кибеллы становится все более жуткой. Наконец, девушка пригубливает напиток из бокала и куртуазным голосом изрекает:{/n} "Кажется, вечер превращается в ночь... Прошу, покажи мне вид на улей. Я хочу окинуть взглядом твои владения".

Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."

languages.text: {n}Mehrere lange Minuten vergehen. In dem erstickenden Schweigen wird Kibellahs Distanziertheit noch viel verstörender. Schließlich nimmt sie einen Schluck aus ihrem Glas und sagt mit höflicher Stimme:{/n} "Es wird schon spät. Könntet Ihr mir bitte eine Aussicht auf die Makropole zeigen? Ich möchte Euer Reich sehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Several long minutes pass. In the suffocating silence, Kibellah's aloofness becomes all the more disturbing. Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mehrere lange Minuten vergehen. In dem erstickenden Schweigen wird Kibellahs Distanziertheit noch viel verstörender. Schließlich nimmt sie einen Schluck aus ihrem Glas und sagt mit höflicher Stimme:{/n} "Es wird schon spät. Könntet Ihr mir bitte eine Aussicht auf die Makropole zeigen? Ich möchte Euer Reich sehen."

languages.text: {n}Pasan unos largos minutos. En el silencio sofocante, la indiferencia de Kibellah se vuelve aún más inquietante. Finalmente, da un sorbo a su copa y dice con voz cortés:{/n} «Se está haciendo tarde. ¿Podría mostrarme las vistas de la colmena? Me gustaría contemplar sus dominios».
languages.original_text: {n}Several long minutes pass. In the suffocating silence, Kibellah's aloofness becomes all the more disturbing. Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasan unos largos minutos. En el silencio sofocante, la indiferencia de Kibellah se vuelve aún más inquietante. Finalmente, da un sorbo a su copa y dice con voz cortés:{/n} «Se está haciendo tarde. ¿Podría mostrarme las vistas de la colmena? Me gustaría contemplar sus dominios».

languages.text: {n}長く感じられる数分間が過ぎる。息苦しいほどの静寂の中、キベラのよそよそしい態度がやけに気になる。やがて彼女はグラスに口を付け、上品な声で言った。{/n}「遅い時間になってきたわね。ハイヴの景色を見せてもらえない？あなたの領域を見てみたいの」
languages.original_text: {n}Several long minutes pass. In the suffocating silence, Kibellah's aloofness becomes all the more disturbing. Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}長く感じられる数分間が過ぎる。息苦しいほどの静寂の中、キベラのよそよそしい態度がやけに気になる。やがて彼女はグラスに口を付け、上品な声で言った。{/n}「遅い時間になってきたわね。ハイヴの景色を見せてもらえない？あなたの領域を見てみたいの」

languages.text: {n}漫长的几分钟过去了，在令人窒息的沉默之中，绮贝菈冷漠的态度让人感到越发不安。到最后，她抿了一口杯中的酒，以温婉的声音开了口。{/n}“已经越来越晚了，你能带我看看巢都吗？我想看看你的王国。”
languages.original_text: {n}Several long minutes pass. In the suffocating silence, Kibellah's aloofness becomes all the more disturbing. Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}漫长的几分钟过去了，在令人窒息的沉默之中，绮贝菈冷漠的态度让人感到越发不安。到最后，她抿了一口杯中的酒，以温婉的声音开了口。{/n}“已经越来越晚了，你能带我看看巢都吗？我想看看你的王国。”

languages.text: {n}De longues minutes s'écoulent. Le silence étouffant ne fait que rendre l'apparente réserve de Kibellah plus perturbante encore. Elle boit une gorgée et énonce d'une voix suave :{/n} « Il se fait tard. Pourriez-vous m'indiquer d'où je pourrais apercevoir la ruche ? J'aimerais voir votre domaine. »
languages.original_text: {n}Several long minutes pass. In the suffocating silence, Kibellah's aloofness becomes all the more disturbing. Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."

traits.locale_text: {n}De longues minutes s'écoulent. Le silence étouffant ne fait que rendre l'apparente réserve de Kibellah plus perturbante encore. Elle boit une gorgée et énonce d'une voix suave :{/n} « Il se fait tard. Pourriez-vous m'indiquer d'où je pourrais apercevoir la ruche ? J'aimerais voir votre domaine. »

languages.text: {n}Dakikalar geçmek bilmiyor. Kibellah'nın kendi içine dönüşü, boğucu sükûnette daha da can sıkıcı bir hâl alıyor. En nihayetinde kadehinden bir yudum alarak nazik bir tonda konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Saat geç oluyor. Rica etsem bana kovan manzarasını gösterebilir misin? Topraklarını görmek isterim."
languages.original_text: {n}Several long minutes pass. In the suffocating silence, Kibellah's aloofness becomes all the more disturbing. Finally, she takes a sip from her glass and says in a suave voice,{/n} "The hour is getting late. Could you please show me a view of the hive? I would like to see your domain."
